apps.name: Unfold++
apps.subtitle: Unfold — Stories Editor & Collage Maker
apps.localizedDescription:
Unfold is a toolkit for storytellers. Create beautiful and engaging stories from minimal and elegant templates.

Enables the following templates in Unfold:

• DW1
• DW2
• NINE
• Art
• RP1
• RP2
•FF1
•FF2
•JN1
•CS1
•CS2
•CS3
•Love 2

Doesn't Enable Fonts or Love,Pride and RED templates.

apps.name: Instagram++
apps.subtitle: Instagram 123.0 | Rocket 3.6.8 | NoAds
apps.localizedDescription: Rocket enriches Instagram client with loads of features! Starting from saving posts, reposting, checking if other users follow you and many more.

apps.name: Twitter++
apps.subtitle: Get unlimited feature on Twitter
apps.localizedDescription:
Sharing Enhancements
• Share Links - Share links from tweets by long pressing on them to bring up the iOS share screen
• Share Images - Share images from tweets by long pressing on them to bring up the iOS share screen
• Tweets Sharing - Allows you to directly share the tweet outside of Twitter (long press in timeline or 3 dots).
• GIF and Vine Share/Save - Allows you to save locally or share GIFS and Vines effectively. Access by long clicking on the GIF when it is fully open (the display view)
• Image/Video Share/Save - Allows you to save locally or share images and videos. Access by long clicking on the Image or Video either in the timeline or the display view (when it is fully open)
• Direct Message Share - Allows you to share messages from a direct message through the iOS share sheet.

App Integrations
• Direct Download Youtube Videos - Download youtube videos from twitter to your phone.
• Youtube Integration - Set Youtube links to open in Youtube app or with the Twitter built in player.
• Instagram Links - Set Instagram links to open in Instagram app or with the Twitter built in media service.
• Browser Integration - Set if you want links to be opened in Twitter default browser or other browser on your phone (Supported Browsers: Chrome, Opera, Dolphin, Atomic, iCab, Puffin).

Additional Enhancements
• Image/Video Download - Download images and videos to your device to watch later.
• Show Keyboard on Compose - Instead of being shown the media screen, have the keyboard show up on compose.
• Automatic Long Tweet Creation - For tweets that are over 140 Chars, Twitter ++ allows you to automatically post tweet as an image or using pastebin.
• Easier List Access - Finally start using lists to organize Twitter! List button added to the main feed back for easy access.
• Confirm Favorite - Bring up confirmation screen when favoriting a tweet.
• Hide Follow in Tweet - Remove the follow button on tweets.
• Remove Status Bar - Enable full screen view for twitter by hiding the top status bar.
• Timeline Badges - In the timeline, show verified badges for users.
• View Blocked Profiles - Continue seeing tweets and profiles of users how have blocked you.

apps.name: YouTube++
apps.subtitle: YouTube 15.15.1 | Cercube 5.1.17
apps.versionDescription:
📹 Updated to YouTube 15.15.1 | Cercube 5.1.17

• Support PiP on iPhones running iOS 13.
• Fixed invalid parameters error when try to save videos.
• Fixed Google account login issues.
• Fixed incompatibility with Little11.
• Other bug fixes and stability improvements.

— Panda App 🐼
apps.localizedDescription:
Adds new features to YouTube:

• Download and save videos up to 4k resolution
• Save videos as audio only
• View, manage and share all your downloads in Cercube's download manager
• Block ads
• Share downloaded videos with other devices via AirDrop
• Background playback for streamed and downloaded videos
• Import downloads to Music or Videos
• Play YouTube videos using Picture-in-Picture mode
• Downloaded videos are displayed within a beautifully crafted downloads manager that shows all the available information
• Choose the default tab to open when launching YouTube
• Stream videos in HD on cellular network
• Auto-replay videos
• Hide floating upload button
• Hide the Trending tab
• Rewind or forward videos
• Cercube options are configurable from within YouTube settings
• Play in high quality on Mobile Data

apps.name: Mini Metro
apps.subtitle: Build a better subway
apps.versionDescription: Mini Metro is now stopping at Barcelona! Carefully manage your train lines to keep this Mediterranean metropolis moving.
apps.localizedDescription:
Mini Metro, the sublime subway simulator, now on iPhone and iPad.


• Included in the App Store Best of 2016
• Mac Game of the Year in over 30 countries
• BAFTA-nominated
• IGF award-winning
• IGN Mobile Game of the Year nominee
• Included in Gamespot's Best Mobile Games of 2016

apps.name: Deezer++
apps.subtitle: Unlocked all premium features!
apps.versionDescription: Warning: uninstall original Deezer app first!
apps.localizedDescription:
Enjoy best-in-class features with the Deezer music player:

 • Stream the biggest global hits
 • 56 million songs to discover and enjoy
 • Lean back and find new tracks with Shuffle Mode
 • Get personalized recommendations and explore new music styles with Flow
 • Listen to any playlist you want or create your own

 • Add the tracks you love to your music collection in a single tap with Favorites
 • Organise your new music by artist or genre
 • Share your personal playlists and favorite tracks with others
 • Discover podcasts, radio stations, and audio channels

Want more? Go limitless with Deezer Premium:

 • No ads
 • Offline Mode: download your favorite tracks or podcasts and listen to offline music anywhere
 • Unlimited skips
 • No song shuffling
 • Superior Sound Quality (320 kBps)
 • Music player is compatible with Amazon Alexa and connected devices

apps.name: Channels
apps.subtitle: Watch live TV & events for free with Channels
apps.versionDescription:
• Completely redesigned Events tab
• Most streams will open in the default iOS player instead of in the browser
• 'Open in VLC' support (VLC app has Chromecast)
• Reduced app size by 85%! (168 MB -> 22 MB)
• Smoother loading experience
• Cleanup and bugfixes
apps.localizedDescription:
Channels allows you to watch live TV & sport events for free on your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.
Features you will love:

• Daily live events for NBA, NFL, Soccer, UFC and more
• Categorized live TV channels
• Daily updated Movies & TV Shows

 Follow @channelstheapp on Twitter for more information.

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium.
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ essentially activates spotify premium on your device with one exception: No downloads.

So what does Spotify++ change?

• All kinds of ads removed
• Unlimited skips
• Play any song or album
• Enable extreme streaming quality
• No forced shuffle
• Import songs from the Music app

apps.name: InShot++
apps.subtitle: InShot - Handy, Comprehensive and Fun!
apps.versionDescription:
- Manage materials.
- Flip stickers.
- Other bug fixes and improvements.
apps.localizedDescription:
InShot is a functional video editor tool. You can use it to add music, text, emoji and filters to the video and share it on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.

Features:
- Edit Video
You can not only rotate the photo and make photo collage, but also trim the video like cutting the part of it and adjust video speed as you need.

- Add Sound Effects
You can add music or other sound effects to the videos and easily sync them with timeline.

- Add Text, Emoji & Filters
You can add text, filters and emoji to the video or photo.

- High Resolution
Photos and videos edited by Inshot have HD qualities.

apps.name: Reddit++
apps.subtitle: Find your community
apps.versionDescription:
• Minor fixes and improvements
Previously in 2020.12.0
• Design Update: Now you’ll see a loading spinner at the bottom of the Communities tab until all the communities and content have been fetched.
• Bug Fix: Returning to RPAN after visiting a community won’t freeze the app anymore.
• Minor fixes and improvements—In an effort to be more transparent, we’ll admit that we only put this here in case we forgot something
apps.localizedDescription: This tweaked version allows the user to view deleted posts retrieved by pushshift.io. and removes Ads.

apps.name: Twitch++
apps.subtitle: No Video Ads On Twitch
apps.localizedDescription:
Experience the games you love like never before! Watch live streams and chat with devoted gamers around the world.

Catch the action as it happens! Access all the content you care about, from frenetic Overwatch multiplayer matches to soothing Bob Ross art demos. With millions of unique streamers every day playing everything under the sun, if it’s worth watching, it’s live on Twitch right now.

apps.name: Chimera
apps.subtitle: Chimera is a jailbreak tool for iOS 12.
apps.localizedDescription:
Full-fledged

Chimera is the first true iOS 12 jailbreak to not only feature a CoreTrust bypass so that binaries don't need to be resigned, but to also support A12 devices, including iPhone Xs, iPhone Xr, and the newest iPads. Chimera doesn't tamper with user files, making it safer than alternatives.

Stable

We've rewritten Chimera from the ground up to ensure that there's no battery drain, freezing, or crashing. There's simply nothing else like it, and we can't wait for you to see for yourself

Modern

Chimera comes with a modern package manager, Sileo, featuring a UI made to fit iOS, and packed full of features and speed enhancements to make installing packages a breeze. Rather than sticking to tools built decades ago, it ships with modern system tools designed to take advantage wherever possible..

apps.name: iTorrent
apps.subtitle: Straightforward iOS torrent client app
apps.versionDescription:
Fixed:

• Background mode not work if zero speed limit disabled

What's new:

• Added https protocol support for trackers!
• FTP server replaced by WebDAV, file sharing is now possible through a web browser
• Added background stop when downloading at zero speed
• Clicking on a notification now opens a specific window
• UI improvements
apps.localizedDescription:
iTorrent is an ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support.

What can this app do:

• Download in the background
• Sequential download (use VLC to watch films while loading)
• Add torrent files from Share menu (Safari and other apps)
• Add magnet links directly from Safari
• Store files in Files app (iOS 11+)
• File sharing directly from app
• Download torrent by link
• Download torrent by magnet
• Send notification on torrent downloaded
• FTP Server (unstable)
• Select files to download or not
• Change UI to dark theme

Now supporting these localizations:
• English
• Russian

apps.name: Power Phone Clean
apps.subtitle: Storage Full? Clean space and memory with the tap of a button!
apps.localizedDescription:
Clean your phone, quick and easy!

Apple doesn't allow cache cleaning apps, or memory boost apps, but you can have both features now, thanks to the power of AltStore.

First, Memory Boost will reclaim some of the memory being used by apps in the background, which makes your phone more responsive.

Second, Storage Boost will reclaim some of the space being used by temporary (or cached) files of apps, which gives you more room for photos and other things!

apps.name: unc0ver
apps.subtitle: The most advanced jailbreak tool.
apps.versionDescription:
Made the following changes for the substitute code substitutor:

• Bumped version to 4.3.1 due to a github bug causing an older file to be temporarily available
• Add support for rebooting the userspace for the first time in a jailbreak
• Add support for injecting to the entire userspace
• Add support for looking up or registering services from the sandbox with the cy: prefix for developers
• Reboot the userspace after jailbreaking
• Make major design changes to preserve stock system performance
• Fix random reboots, freezes, memory issues and any known problem that affected system services or apps
• Fix persistent software update blocker on iOS 13 (Works in the jailed state too)
• Fix a design problem that affected the Succession restore tool
• Automatically re-enable software updates when restoring RootFS
apps.localizedDescription:
unc0ver is a jailbreak, which means that you can have the freedom to do whatever you would like to do to your iOS device. Allowing you to change what you want and operate within your purview, unc0ver unlocks the true power of your iDevice.

Compatibility:
unc0ver supports iOS 11.0 through to iOS 13.3 (Excluding 12.3-12.3.2).

Stability:
Utilizing the latest stable APT and Mobile Substrate, stability is guaranteed.
